attributes.action: enable the NHS and hospitals to refuse to treat patients whos injuries have come from a drug overdose or something similar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the NHS should not be wasting money on drug addicts. they know the risks of taking drugs and by taking them they understand that they could die. the NHS has better things to spend its money on other than treating idiots. such as finding a cure for cancer. 
if someone goes into hospital dying because of a heroin overdose they should be turned away.
